^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

SensorNumber.description: The numerical identifier for this sensor.
SensorNumber.longDescription: This property shall contain a numerical identifier for this sensor that is unique within this resource.

SensorValue.longDescription: This property shall contain the sensor value.
